TopicTitle: Union of the Socialist Kerbin Republics

Articles.Content:
Hello there! I've been peeking on this forum for quite a while, only today I've decided to actually make an account and participate here, to give you the people news about what I've been working on recently.

I've made many logs/journals/reports on many games including Kerbal Space Program, but only recently I've decided to make one entirely public.

No this isn't a story, this is an ongoing space program (making it's first baby steps) and it's going big.

Below I have links to a Tumblr account and a Youtube one. Already filled with some content, but what's bigger is the world behind it. One of the first thing I did on the tumblr account was to publish a map showing the only two nations on Kerbin. The whole world has already been created, and it's alive!

Unlike other space programs, this one is not the main character, it's not the center of Kerbin, this space program is part of a Nation, in war with another one, and as a viewer, you can only see one side, and that is the side of the USKR. In a cold war with the UKS.

The Kerbals are on a different time-scale, their whole world is smaller, but there are still some challenges, political ones, economical ones, at this stage most of the USKR population haven't even heard of the Official USKR Space Program, news are slowly coming in, people hear more and more about it, you are the people, witnessing the USKR Space program slowly grow up, going farther, giving better data, sending better pictures, better video quality, more people, better organisation.

The earlier you join, the more progress you'll witness, and now is the time, because the USKR is still using solid fuel rockets to try to get into orbit.

Hope I convinced you to take a look, and see you around!

http://www.youtube.com/user/OfficialUSKRprogram/videos

http://officialuskrspaceprogram.tumblr.com/
